title: Consilium Antipodagricum Sive Dissertatiuncula brevis de Arthritide morbo pertinacissimo molestissimo ac dolorifico ... subject: Historische Drucke
source: Pistorius, Johann: Consilium Antipodagricum Sive Dissertatiuncula brevis de Arthritide morbo pertinacissimo molestissimo ac dolorifico ...
